channel.title: ComiKet Archives - VNN
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: New S.C.X Album “Reverberations 4” to be Released During Comiket 96!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
The circle composed by Clean Tears and T-ism, named S.C.X, is going to release an amazing new album during Comic Market 96, titled “Reverberations 4“! About the Album We surely know very well S.C.X’s works, known to be an unmissable quality music creator for any vocaloid fans that loves Trance songs on their playlists! We …

The post New S.C.X Album “Reverberations 4” to be Released During Comiket 96! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The circle composed by Clean Tears and T-ism, named S.C.X, is going to release an amazing new album during Comic Market 96, titled “Reverberations 4“!

About the Album

We surely know very well S.C.X’s works, known to be an unmissable quality music creator for any vocaloid fans that loves Trance songs on their playlists! We also find guest artists such as kaito and 泡沫, alongside tak who provided this awesome cover art!

Each tune seems to light up not only Hatsune Miku‘s vocal, but also bring the listener a whole new sound to liven up their days! Let’s have a look at the album’s track list together!

Track list

  1. Intro – Reverberations 4
  2. Eidetic image
  3. Repeat
  4. Clarity
  5. To be style (Reverberations 4 Remix)
  6. Moment (Reverberations 4 Remix)
  7. Observer
  8. SAKURA
  9. SAKURA (Reverberations 4 Remix)

Priced at 1,000 JPY during the event on August 12th and soon 1,200 JPY through various online shops, this album will make an awesome addition to your collection!

We will update the article once more information about online sales will be released, but in the meanwhile don’t forget to follow us on VNN for more content!

You can find more about Comic Market 96 on its official website
You can find Clean Tears (and S.C.X) on Facebook, Youtube, Twitter, SoundCloud, Piapro and their website!
Official page of the album

The post New S.C.X Album “Reverberations 4” to be Released During Comiket 96! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Pinocchio-P Announces Self-Remix Album “P+”
item.dc:creator: Dane David
item.description:
To commemorate his 10 years in the music industry, Pinocchio-P has revamped his past works in the form of a remix album P+! The album features 1 new track and 7 remixed songs from his past music catalog. The expected release day is on September 19, 2019. If you want to receive the album earlier, …

The post Pinocchio-P Announces Self-Remix Album “P+” appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
To commemorate his 10 years in the music industry, Pinocchio-P has revamped his past works in the form of a remix album P+! The album features 1 new track and 7 remixed songs from his past music catalog. The expected release day is on September 19, 2019.

If you want to receive the album earlier, and at a discount price, it will be available at Comiket 96 on August 12, in the Tokyo International Exhibit Center. The venue price of P+ will be at ￥1,500 (approx. $14), while the mail-order price will be ￥1,800 (approx. $16) + tax. A special badge will be available with P+ exclusively for those who purchase the album at the event.

Other Pinocchio-P merchandise will also be available, such as other CDs, rubber straps and masking tape.

CD

As well as P+, these previously released albums will also be available:

Proliferation of Imamura – ￥1,000 (approx. $9)
Comic and Cosmic – ￥2,000 (2CD) (approx. $18)
Antenna – ￥1,000 (approx. $9)
Яareno Collection – ￥1,000 (approx. $9) (Limited Stock)

Goods

Rubber Strap ( ¥ 700 each, approx. $6):
MUSHROOM AIMAINA
MUSHROOM DOUSHITE
IMAMURA AIMAINA

Masking Tape ( ¥ 600, approx. $5. Limited Stock.)
KOUZOU SURU DOUSHITE

P+ Trailer Video

Tracklist

Onion+ is a new original song exclusive to P+! It’s PV was released prior to the release of the album and can be watched below.

Producer: Pinocchio-P
Featured Vocaloid: Hatsune Miku

  1. TAMANEGI+ (Onion+)
  2. Fireworks+
  3. HITORI NO KAERIMICHI+ (My Way Home Alone+)
  4. eight hunderd+
  5. PONKOTSU TENSHI+ (The Scraped Angel+)
  6. PSYCHEDELIC SMILE+
  7. NINGEN NANKA DAIKIRAI+ (I Just Hate People+)
  8. DOUSHITE-CHAN NO THEME+ (Doushite-chan’s theme+)

Be sure to support Pinocchio-P by purchasing the album! Happy 10 years to Pinocchio-P!

Pre-Order/Buy

AMAZON JAPAN
BOOTH
OFFICIAL WEBSITE

The post Pinocchio-P Announces Self-Remix Album “P+” appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hitoshizuku × Yama△ “If the world3” Album to be Released at Comiket 96!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
The iconic duo Hitoshizuku x Yama△ is going back to Comic Market 96 this year, bringing us a whole new installments of their fairy tale-themed albums: “If the world3“! Album Details and Crossfade Video Those who follow this iconic producer duo know very well how their songs usually take inspiration from themes such as fairy …

The post Hitoshizuku × Yama△ “If the world3” Album to be Released at Comiket 96! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The iconic duo Hitoshizuku x Yama△ is going back to Comic Market 96 this year, bringing us a whole new installments of their fairy tale-themed albums: “If the world3“!

Album Details and Crossfade Video

Those who follow this iconic producer duo know very well how their songs usually take inspiration from themes such as fairy tales and folklore stories, often even creating their own series through vocaloid songs. “If the world3” is their third album based off of fairy tales-inspired songs, and aims to bring back the magic of iconic stories we probably even read back when we were just children!

You might have been able to recognize some of the voices, even VY2 and the VOCALOID5 voice library Ken made their appearances in this album! Let’s check the track list together!

Track list

  1. Intermezzo
    Vocal: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin & Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO, MEIKO, Camui Gackpo, GUMI, IA, MAYU, VY2, Ken
  2. Queen Thumbelina (Inspired by “Thumbelina“)
    Vocal: Kagamine Rin & Len, KAITO, Camui Gackpo, VY2
  3. Alice in N.Y. (Inspired by “Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland“)
    Vocal: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin & Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO, MEIKO, Camui Gackpo, GUMI, IA, MAYU
  4. Katatsuki no Shura (Inspired by “Kintarō“)
    Vocal: Camui Gackpo
  5. Akasha’s Traveler (Inspired by “Aladdin and the Magic Lamp“)
    Vocal: KAITO
  6. Gift (Inspired by “Urashima Tarō“)
    Vocal: Kagamine Rin & Len
  7. To the Star of Bethlehem (Inspired by “The Little Match Girl“)
    Vocal: Hatsune Miku

We got to listen to Alice in N.Y. not long ago, but we are so happy to see more amazing songs coming in this album! In addition, Suzunosuke‘s artworks give the characters such an enchanting look, perfect for fairy tales!

Limited Edition with Merchandise Pack

This album comes in both standard and limited edition, and the latter also includes a merchandise set!

Priced only 3,000 JPY (event only price), this special edition comes with:

  • “If the world3” album
  • “Alice in N.Y.” Tote-bag
  • Two can badges (Alice’s one is always included, while the second one will be picked randomly among the other four designs)
  • “Alice in N.Y.” Mini Towel (Pink version)
  • “Queen Thumbelina” Character Postcards (Set of 6)

Both of those editions will be available through teamOS‘s booths during Comic Market 96 and Magical Mirai 2019’s Creators Market, so keep your eyes wide open for them if you manage to attend!

Buy it Online as Well!

As you could have guessed from the mini towel, you can also buy the album online via Toranoana, Melonbooks and Animate Online Shop!

Both standard and limited editions are almost the same, made exception of the mini towel which will be white and blue instead. Below you can find all the links!

  • Toranoana – Standard can be found here for 1,500 JPY, while the limited edition is here and priced 4,532 JPY. Tax fees are not included!
  • Melonbooks – Standard can be found here for 1,620 JPY, while the limited edition is here and priced 4,895 JPY.
  • Animate Online Shop – Only standard edition available, priced 1,620 JPY. Click here to check it out!

The limited edition is bond to go sold out very fat so you better place your order as soon as possible!

Remember that you might need some help to obtain the album outside Japan!

Source

It is always a pleasure for us to talk about incoming albums, and with TeamOS being such a legendary circle, this album would surely make a great addition to your collection! Don’t you think?

Don’t forget to follow us on VNN for more, amazing news!

You can find more about Comic Market 96 on its official website
Don’t forget to also check out Magical Mirai 2019’s official website and Twitter!
As for TeamOS’ works, you should definitely follow Hitoshizuku, Yama△ and Suzunosuke on Twitter!
Hitoshizuku and Yama△ also have a website!

The post Hitoshizuku × Yama△ “If the world3” Album to be Released at Comiket 96! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOCALOID Merchandise at ComiKet 92
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
Comic Market (or ComiKet) is taking place at the Tokyo Big Sight starting today! The semi-annual doujin fair has always been a great place to find VOCALOID merchandise, and ComiKet 92 will be no exception, with various VOCALOID companies and producers offering exclusive goods! We have provided a rundown of as many of the products …

The post VOCALOID Merchandise at ComiKet 92 appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Comic Market (or ComiKet) is taking place at the Tokyo Big Sight starting today! The semi-annual doujin fair has always been a great place to find VOCALOID merchandise, and ComiKet 92 will be no exception, with various VOCALOID companies and producers offering exclusive goods!

We have provided a rundown of as many of the products and promotions available as we could, as well as details of the event and where to find 1st Place and BIGHEAD below.

1st Place

1st PLACE announced that they will be offering merchandise featuring VOCALOID IA and the characters from Kagerou Project!

Besides selling various goods at the event, 1st PLACE will also be running a special promotion, where a free bonus item will be given to customers who spend over 3,000 JPY on their products.

For more details on the products and promotional items offered, check out the summaries below.

IA Merchandise

1st PLACE have announced that the following IA products will be on sale at this event.

IA Pins

Price: 1,200 JPY

There are 3 types of pins available: IA super-deformed, IA logo and ARIA mark.

IA Necklace

Price: 800 JPY

This dog tag necklace features the IA logo on the front and a silhouette of IA on the back.

IA Sketchbook

Price: 500 JPY

This IA sketchbook was made in collaboration with the stationary company マルマン (Maruman), who have a reputation for excellence in design and quality according to 1st PLACE!

IA Ema

Price: 1,200 JPY

For those who don’t know, an ema is a wooden plaque which Shinto worshipers write their prayers or wishes on. This one features IA in a cute shrine maiden outfit!

IA Coin Case

Price: 800 JPY

This coin case features a cute chibi IA.

Kagerou Project Merchandise

Kagerou Project Rubber Phone Straps

Price: 500 JPY each

These cute rubber phone straps feature the various characters from Kagerou Project in animal themed kigurumi.

Kagerou Project Keychains

Price: 500 JPY each

This assortment of keychains also features the Kagerou Project characters in their animal themed kigurumi. The keychains have a unique star-shaped ring and can also be used as coasters!

Kagerou Project Leather Can Badges

Price: 500 JPY each

These can badges also feature the Kagerou Project characters in their animal themed kigurumi.

Kagerou Project Clear File Folders

Price: 300 JPY each

There’s plenty of choice for these Kagerou Project clear file folders, of which there are 12 different designs to choose from!

Kagerou Project T-Shirts

Price: 2,500 JPY

There are 5 different designs of Kagerou Project T-shirts on offer, which are redesigns of the shirts that proved to be so popular at Niconico Cho Kaigi 2017 that they sold out!

Kagerou Project A2 Posters

Price: 500 JPY each

These Kagerou Project A2 posters come in 2 different styles.

 

Kagerou Project Coin Cases

Price: 800 JPY each

These coin cases feature the Kagerou Project characters in cute animal outfits.

Kagerou Project Acrylic Stands

Price: 1,000 JPY each

This type of acrylic stand actually moves when shaken and comes in 3 different styles!

Kagerou Project Acrylic Badges

Price: 500 JPY each

These acrylic badges come in 9 different styles, featuring the Kagerou Project characters in eared hoodies, designed by the artist しづ  (Shidu).

Shidu ‘Bar Girl’ Sketchbook

Price: 500 JPY

A sketchbook of Shidu’s works, featuring (of all things) a girl with a crowbar!

Ishifuro Illustration Collection, ‘ISHIFURO WORKS’

Price: 1,000 JPY

This art book features a collection of illustrations by producer, Ishifuro.

Kirai-chan Rubber Phone Strap

Price: 500 JPY

This rubber strap features a chibi illustration of Ishifuro’s well-known character, Kirai-chan.

1st Place’s Special Promotion

All customers who purchase over 3,000 JPY worth of products will receive a special bonus in the form of an original memo pad, featuring one of four designs.

Please note that stock is limited so the promotion will end once the memo pads are out of stock.

40mP

40mP and Shano will be attending at 44ab, East, on the first day only and will be distributing their album ‘Mint’.

You can find information on the tracklist here.

BIGHEAD

BIGHEAD revealed on their Facebook page that they will be attending ComiKet 92 and selling various merchandise, as pictured below.

The items and prices shown are as follows:

Albums: 2,500 JPY

Short-sleeve T-shirts: 4,500 JPY

Long-sleeve T-Shirt: 8,000 JPY

BIGHEAD will also be selling their new album REWIND’93, which comes in a special cassette edition that is exclusive to ComiKet 92.

You can listen to a crossfade of the album below.

You can find BIGHEAD at 31b, East, on the first day only.

BIGHEAD’s Special Promotion

BIGHEAD also has a special bonus item for customers on a first-come-first-served basis.

These cute Miku keychains are in a limited quantity so they will only be available while supplies last.

buzzG

buzzG will be selling their album, ‘The World Rewritten by Daydream‘, for 1,000 JPY.

buzzG will be attending on the first day only at 52b, East.

ChomP

ChomP will be attending on the first day only at 13a, East, and will be selling his new album, ‘Stylized’, for 500 JPY

You can listen to a demo of the album here.

Other albums:

“Prime”: 1000 JPY

“Ripple & Revive”: 1000 JPY

Coco Lab

Coco Lab will be selling various Racing Miku merchandise at the event.

Racing Miku Merchandise

Scrunchie: 756 JPY

Glowing IC Card Stickers: 1,728 JPY

Smartphone Rings: 1,620 JPY

Full Graphic T-Shirt: 5,000 JPY

You will find Coco Lab at 4222, West, on the 4th Floor.

MayoRiyo

MayoRiyo announced on their Twitter that they will be attending ComiKet 92 and selling various items featuring their artwork.

Artbook “The Miku’s Closet 7”: 1,000 JPY
Artbook “The Luka’s Closet”: 1,000 JPY
“Lift Up Your Knee Socks” T-Shirt (M and XL sizes): 2,000 JPY
Artbook “The Miku’s Closet 6”: 1,000 JPY
Artbook “The Miku’s Closet 5”: 1,000 JPY
Artbook “7 Palette”: 1,200 JPY
Artbook “The Miku’s Closet 0”: 500 JPY
Artbook “The Miku’s Closet Summer Time”: 1,000 JPY

MayoRiyo can be found at 32a on the first day only.

Nakka

Nakka announced on Twitter that they will be selling badges featuring VOCALOID artwork, as well as characters from other franchises.

You can find Nakka at 32a, East, on the first day of ComkiKet 92.

NishizawasanP

NishizawasanP and Bete revealed on Twitter that they will be in attendance and selling goods as well as albums, including 23jino Et cetera, which will be making its debut at ComiKet 92.

Bokura no Machi ni Ai ga Furu Yoru da: 300 JPY

All other albums: 1,000 JPY each

iPhone case: 1,500 JPY

Shirokuma Tote bag: 1,500 JPY

NishizawasanP and Bete will be attending ComiKet 92 on the first day only and you can find them at No. 45b, East.

There’s even a map provided!

 

Sports Hochi Tabloid

Hochi will also be offering various VOCALOID merchandise and you can find them at No.1914, West.

Sports Hochi Merchandise

Here is a summary of all the items on offer and their prices.

Hatsune Miku B2 Sized Tapestry (illust. by TOKIYA): 3,000 JPY
Hatsune Miku Acrylic Stand (illust. by TOKIYA): 1,500 JPY
Smartphone Case (Shirako Mugi Ver.): 3,500 JPY
Smartphone Case (KEI Ver.): 3,500 JPY
Clear File Folders (2 set) (illust. by U35 & Shirako Mugi): 1,000 JPY
Tabloid: Summer 2nd issue & Snow Miku 2017 Festival issue:  500 JPY each

Takumaru and Kirina (Aoiro * Qualia)

Takumaru and Kirina (who together make up “Aoiro * Qualia”) will be distributing their album ‘Native Sense’, which features Kagamine Len as the main VOCALOID.

You can listen to the crossfade of the album on SoundCloud below.

[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/playlists/340471256″ params=”auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /]

Takumaru and Kirina will be attending on the first day only at 01b, East.

Team MAKETS

The album ‘Tsuki no Uta VII‘ will be making its debut at ComiKet 92 courtesy of Team MAKETS.

‘Tsuki no Uta VII’ will be priced at 1,000 JPY and you can find Team MAKETS at 13b, East, on the first day only. You can listen to a crossfade of their album below.

Yunosuke

Yunosuke announced on Twitter that they and Haruno will be at 34a, East on the first day of ComiKet with the following merchandise on sale.

Album “flowers laugh”: 500 JPY (click here for more information)

Album “Unique Antique”: 1000 JPY

Album “Pathos”: 1000 JPY

Clear File Folders (based on Pa III.SENSATION): 300 JPY each

Can Badges (based on PA III. SENSATION): 200 JPY each

Yuzuki Yukari Racing

The Yuzuki Yukari Racing team will be selling various merchandise that you may recognize from our previous article about WonFes.

Racing Yukari Sticker (smartphone size): 2,000 JPY

Racing Yukari Car Decal Sticker (13cm): 2,000 JPY

Racing Yukari Car Decal Sticker (20cm): 3,000 JPY

Racing Yukari Key Chain: 1,000 JPY

Racing Yukari Can Badge: 1,000 JPY

Racing Yukari Mug: 2,000 JPY

Racing Yukari Cotton Tote Bag & Team Towel Set: 4,000 JPY

The Yuzuki Yukari Racing booth will actually not be in the Tokyo Big Sight venue itself, but will be stationed at the nearby Kitsunezuka Bike Workshop, which specializes in making VOCALOID-themed bicycles.

CielP

CielP‘s Twitter revealed that they will be present on the first day of ComiKet at 11b, East to promote and sell their brand new albums, “Healing” and “Flying,” for 500 JPY each. Illustrations for both album jackets were provided by Natsuki.

Clean Tears

Clean Tears will be stationed at 32b, East to debut their newest album, Reverberations 3, available for 1000 JPY. They will only be there for day 1 of ComiKet.

mothy

Finally, mothy, creator of the Evillious Chronicles, can be found at 48b, East on the first day of ComiKet to distribute the long-awaited ‘master of the heavenly yard‘ album, the conclusion the popular series!

‘master of the heavenly yard’ will feature a 15 minutes and 56 second long track that compiles all 12 songs in the long-running series, plus an 8-page short story booklet. The album will be available at ComiKet for 500 JPY, and those who purchase it during the event will also receive a free postcard. See the below tweet for a short teaser!

テスト。 pic.twitter.com/y4csVJwMdl

— mothy_悪ノP＠1日目東あ48b (@mothy_akuno) August 4, 2017

‘Lucifenia Trinity‘ and ‘Genzai Monogatari‘ will also be available for 500 JPY and 1000 JPY, respectively. Jacket illustrations for all three albums were provided by Ichika.

More Releases

This has been but a taste of all that ComiKet 92 has to offer for VOCALOID fans! If you want to see a list for many of the albums being released at ComiKet 92, you can find them here on VocaDB’s ComiKet 92 page.

How about more artwork and other merchandise, you ask? Due to the size of the ComiKet event, there are so many guests offering VOCALOID merchandise that it’s impossible for us to cover them all! But here’s how you yourself can find what you’re looking for!

Click here to access the registration page for ComiKet’s online catalog, and enter the following information:

1. Email Address
2. Email Address (confirm)
3. Start Registration.

Check your email inbox for am email containing a link to the registration page, and open it. Then enter the following information:

1. Password (musts contain at least 8 characters, and at least 1 number)
2. Password (confirm)
3. Nickname
4. Birthdate (year-month-day format)
5. Telephone number
6. Check box to receive email updates about signing up for future events
7. Check box to receive emails about the doujin scene
8. Check box to receive emails about Print Navi services
9. UNCHECK box if you wish to filter out adult oriented content
10. Proceed to the confirmation page

Click on the orange box to complete registration.

Once registered, you can access the ComiKet 92 online catalog here, and enter keywords like “VOCALOID” or “ホーかロイド,” or even specific VOCALOID or producer names into the search bar, and start performing your own searches in your desired categories!

1. Search participating groups
2. Search by group details
3. Favorites
4. Search company booths
5. Cosplay lookup

Exhibition Details

For details on when and where ComiKet 92 will be held, check out the summary below for the key dates, venue and the booth numbers of the guests mentioned above.

Date: August 11th to 13th

Venue: Tokyo Big Sight

Booth Locations

1st PLACE Booth: No. 4253, West 4th Floor

40mP: No.44ab, East. (Day 1 only.)

BIGHEAD Booth: No. 31b, East. (Day 1 only)

buzzG: No. 52b, East. (Day 1 only)

ChomP: No. 13a, East. (Day 1 only)

MayoRiyo: No. 32a, East. (Day 1 only)

Nakka: No. 23a, East. (Day 1 only)

NishizawasanP: No. 45b, East. (Day 1 only)

Coco Lab: No. 4222, West 4th Floor.

Sports Hochi Tabloid: No. 1914, West.

Takumaru & Kirina: No. 01b, East. (Day 1 only)

Team MAKETS: No. 13b, East. (Day 1 only)

Yunosuke: No. 34a, East. (Day 1 only)

Yukari Racing: Kitsunezuka Bike Workshop

CielP: No. 11b, East (Day 1 only)

Clean Tears: No 32b, East (Day 1 only)

mothy: No. 48b, East (Day 1 only)

More Details

For more information on ComiKet you can visit their official websites, for domestic or overseas fans, which are both linked below.

Visit the official ComiKet website

Visit the official ComiKet website for overseas attendees

—

Source:

1stplace.co.jp　(Report 1 + Report 2)

BIGHEAD’s Facebook page

VocaDB

The post VOCALOID Merchandise at ComiKet 92 appeared first on VNN.
